decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Condition : 2 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted (numbered: 7817-01 - 01, 7817-02 - 02
Received: 19/12/2017) therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.
Condition : 3 - The materials to be used in the construction of the external surfaces of the extension hereby permitted shall match those used in the existing building.

Condition : 4 - The windows adjacent to the proposed forecourt seating area shall (if openable) not be kept open later than 11 pm or before 8 am on any day and the seating shown on the approved drawings shall be removed at 11 pm and not reinstated before 8 am on the following day.
description: Installation of a new shopfront and creation of a outside seating area
